column1: #Text=Aang says : " You tell me where he is now ! "
#Text=Sha - Mo : says : " What did you do ? "
#Text=Ghashiun says : " I - It was n't me ! "
#Text=Toph says : " You said to put a muzzle on him ! "
#Text=He 's probably in Ba Sing Se by now !
#Text=They were going to sell him there !
#Text=We 'll escort you out of the desert !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Just get out of here !

#Text=" Main Aang Iroh Katara Momo Sokka Toph Zuko Antagonists Rough Rhinos Kahchi Mongke Ogodei Vachir Yeh - Lu Xin Fu Yu says : " Minor Fung Ghashiun Sha - Mo Various sandbenders " Sokka says : " Dad !
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Thanks to your sister .
#Text=I 'm in no shape to fight , but maybe there 's some way I can help .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Everything 's going smoothly and the eclipse has n't even kicked in yet .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Let 's hope our luck holds out .
#Text=Please tell me you 're here because the Fire Lord turned out to be a big wimp and you did n't even need the eclipse to take him down .
#Text=" Aang says : " He was n't home .
